results.name: Nightmare Night At Anac FORGOTTEN PART DLC

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Quad-core 64bit OS required
  • Memory: 80 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2 GB of RAM minimum, OpenGL 2.1 and GLSL 1.2 support (generally 2012 or newer) Dedicated graphics card with 2 GB of RAM minimum, OpenGL 2.1 and GLSL 1.2 support (generally 2012 or newer)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 80 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
